languages.text: Исполинская каменная рука, покрытая древними рунами, отчетливо излучает варп-энергию — слабую, но достаточную для того, чтобы у вас начало пощипывать кожу на лице.

traits.locale_text: Исполинская каменная рука, покрытая древними рунами, отчетливо излучает варп-энергию — слабую, но достаточную для того, чтобы у вас начало пощипывать кожу на лице.

languages.text: The giant stone hand covered in ancient runes clearly radiates with warp energy — faint, but strong enough to make the skin on your face tingle.
languages.original_text: Исполинская каменная рука, покрытая древними рунами, отчетливо излучает варп-энергию — слабую, но достаточную для того, чтобы у вас начало пощипывать кожу на лице.

traits.locale_text: The aged menhir covered in ancient runes clearly radiates with warp energy — faint, but strong enough to make the skin on your face tingle.
The aged menhir covered in ancient runes clearly radiates with warp energy — faint, but strong enough to make the skin on your face tingle.
The aged menhir covered in ancient runes clearly radiates with Warp energy — faint, but strong enough to make the skin on your face tingle.
The aged menhir covered in ancient runes clearly radiates with Warp energy — faint, but strong enough to make the skin on your face tingle.
The old menhir covered in ancient runes clearly radiates with warp energy — faint, but strong enough to make the skin on your face tingle.
The giant stone hand covered in ancient runes clearly radiates with warp energy — faint, but strong enough to make the skin on your face tingle.
The giant stone hand covered in ancient runes clearly radiates with warp energy — faint, but strong enough to make the skin on your face tingle.

languages.text: 这块巨大的石头上刻满了古老的符文，清晰地散发着亚空间的能量。虽然很微弱，但足以让你的脸颊感到刺痛。
languages.original_text: The giant stone hand covered in ancient runes clearly radiates with warp energy — faint, but strong enough to make the skin on your face tingle.

traits.locale_text: 这座老旧的石碑上刻满了古老的符文，清晰地散发着亚空间的能量。虽然很微弱，但足以让你的脸颊感到刺痛。

languages.text: La mano de piedra gigante cubierta de runas ancestrales irradia la inconfundible energía de la disformidad. Es leve, pero basta para hacerte sentir un cosquilleo en la cara.
languages.original_text: The giant stone hand covered in ancient runes clearly radiates with warp energy — faint, but strong enough to make the skin on your face tingle.

traits.locale_text: El menhir antiguo cubierto de runas ancestrales irradia la inconfundible energía de la disformidad. Es leve, pero basta para hacerte sentir un cosquilleo en la cara.

languages.text: 古代ルーンがびっしり刻まれた、巨大な手型の石は明らかに歪みエネルギーを放っている。かすかではあるが、顔の肌がピリつくほどの強さを秘めている。
languages.original_text: The giant stone hand covered in ancient runes clearly radiates with warp energy — faint, but strong enough to make the skin on your face tingle.

traits.locale_text: 古代ルーンがびっしり刻まれた、巨大な手型の石は明らかに歪みエネルギーを放っている。かすかではあるが、顔の肌がピリつくほどの強さを秘めている。

languages.text: Die riesige, mit alten Runen versehene Hand aus Stein strahlt eindeutig Warpenergie ab – nicht viel, aber genug, dass die Haut auf deinem Gesicht kribbelt.
languages.original_text: The giant stone hand covered in ancient runes clearly radiates with warp energy — faint, but strong enough to make the skin on your face tingle.

traits.locale_text: Der alte, runenbedeckte Menhir strahlt eindeutig Warpenergie ab – nicht viel, aber genug, dass die Haut auf deinem Gesicht kribbelt.

languages.text: La pierre géante couverte de runes anciennes dégage de l'énergie du Warp. À peine perceptible, elle suffit toutefois à faire picoter la peau de votre visage.
languages.original_text: The giant stone hand covered in ancient runes clearly radiates with warp energy — faint, but strong enough to make the skin on your face tingle.

traits.locale_text: Le vieux menhir couvert de runes anciennes dégage de l'énergie du Warp. À peine, mais suffisamment pour que vous sentiez la peau de votre visage picoter.

languages.text: Kadim rünlerle kaplı taştan dev el, açık bir şekilde öteboyut enerjisi yayıyor. Hafif bir enerji ama yüzünün derisini titreştirecek kadar da güçlü.
languages.original_text: The giant stone hand covered in ancient runes clearly radiates with warp energy — faint, but strong enough to make the skin on your face tingle.

traits.locale_text: Kadim rünlerle kaplı taştan dev el, açık bir şekilde öteboyut enerjisi yayıyor. Hafif bir enerji ama yüzünün derisini titreştirecek kadar da güçlü.
